title.rendered: Guest Testimonial – Tour Reviews – Namaste India Trip

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”5″ el_class=”testimonial”][vc_column][vc_column_text]Why would more than 52,000 people choose to trust us with their travel plans every year? Why would our customers keep returning to us and recommend our services to their loved ones? Why do our customers consider us their trustworthy and resourceful friends who can safely handle all the nuances of any trip so gracefully? That we are able to inspire such trust in our esteemed customers, that we get to accompany them in their moments of utter bliss on sacred voyages, that we get to become a part of the memories they cherish throughout their lives, inspires us to strive to become better in what we do, with every trip, with every traveler. Well, why don’t we let our customers speak further? Why don’t you listen to the stories from our guests themselves of their journeys we had a privilege planning for them?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”5″ css=”.vc_custom_1530177284518{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

Reviews for : All Services

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”saying-traveler” css=”.vc_custom_1515410896890{background-color: #f8f8f8 !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1515412078498{border-right-width: 1px !important;border-right-color: #f1eaea !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Travellers rating

4.3 of 5 stars

Based on 4305 Reviews

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1515412114003{border-right-width: 1px !important;border-right-color: #f1eaea !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

58%
Excellent

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1515412130153{border-right-width: 1px !important;border-right-color: #f1eaea !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

38%
Very Good

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

8%
Average

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

MANJMA H K PRAJIT
  We had a wonderful, very well organized trip. The journey through Garhwal was one of the most interesting experiences we ever had. As we look back at our time here, I am sure our memories will be significant. Apart from the extraordinary beauty of Garhwal, we will also remember, the very comfortable arrangements, the unique aspect of your place is your people, their attitude, their warm hearts, their ability to care. No amount of money can compensate for your attitude towards tourism. We had a great time in Agra-Mathura-Amritsar-Haridwar-Kedarnath-Badrinath-Delhi. We had a wonderful and well organised trip from Namaste India Delhi, Mr.Harsh Vardhan we thank you very much for the comfortable trip and the great hospitality. please accept again our gratitude for the lovely time I will not hesitate to recommend your company and its very personal approach to all my friends. I wish Namaste India Team the best in all its endeavours. Thanks Again! Warm Regards Manjma H K Prajit.  
Agra-Amritsar-Haridwar-Badrinath-Kedarnath-Delhi Trip

Bhusan Raj
  me and my family had gone for a tour of Uttarakhand. namaste india trip made my journey extremely comfortable and hassle free. we were able to visit all the top tourist locations and all the sightseeings were done in time. our bus was in time, our guide was well versed in his knowledge about the area and special care was taken for my old parents who are not capable of walking long distances. the hotel was up to the mark and we were served with complimentary breakfast and morning tea or coffee as per our liking. thank you namaste india trip for making this journey so memorable. we will surely book again.  
Very Good

BSK
  Kind Attn: Mrs.Shanthi / Mr.Ravi Kumar Battarai/Mr.Suresh Sharma An excellent trip we had to Nepal. Many thanks to all of you! Will be in touch with you again! I Request Mr.Ravi Kumar to convey my thanks and good wishes to him. Many Thanks Again!  
Nepal Trip

Dimple Desai
  My family and me decided to go on a soulful journey to uttarakhand. our family friend recommended namasteindiatrip to us since our budget was a little tight. Our family of 5 had the time of our lives there since everything was extremely well taken care of. From our pickups and drops to our sightseeing expeditions and even our hotel everything was on point. Our guide was very informative and especially our manager who was there to help us with whatever we needed no matter what time of the day. Great work Namaste! Thank you for a memorable trip.  
Very Good

Nikita
  Our trip was very well organised. from the pick up moment itself to the drop off, all our requirement were met with diligence. our tour manager was also very helpful and guided us obediently. our guide was also extremely knowledgeable and took us to some of the most fun and memorable tourist spots.  
Memorable Trip

Rakhi
  i recommend namaste india trip for everyone looking to have a hassle free travel experience. their arrangement was to the point and the stays were extremely comfortable too.  
Very Good

Praveen
  Me and my wife went on this trip and we had a great time along with our fellow group people. everything was up to mark from the places we visited to our driver. however one little aspect which you should focus on improving is the food provided in between stops.  
Good

U.Hari Krishna
  Good Morning, I am very glad to Inform that I have a very great Experience of Gujarat tour, Priya from Namaste India Trip was very helpful right from the day we booked our tour to today the greatest part is immediate response, I thanks Namaste India Trip for providing pleasant, very economical, and Safe trip. I have to Thank my Driver for giving us pleasant and safe drive, thanks to one and all of team Namaste for providing wonderful Tour Experience keep going on and we all will support you.  

PN.Vijayn
  Dear Shanthi ji, Greetings We are thankful to you and your Namasthe company for your valuable services and timely alternative arrangements . we will pass the details of your Namasthe comp.to our neighbors who are desirous of Kashi trips.  
Kashi trips

GAYATRISHIVA
  We r thankful ms. rashmi madam thank q very much for yr service at all my trip like manali , shimla & delhi we r enjoying very much .  
THANK Q FOR NAMASTEINDIA TRIP

Aashutosh
  last week was the best vacation of my life. me and my family (wife and daughter) went on a trip to Shimla, Manali and Rohtang, and i must say that all the facilites and services were up to the mark. we never had any sort of a hassle. we thoroughly enjoyed the sightseeing trips. our guide was also very helpful and knowledgeable and answered all our questions or doubts willingly. overall, it was a memorable time.  
Nice

Jitendra kapadiya
  Very honest, friendly and libral for us. we will like to use your services again and again and also refer to other. They provide star hotel.and make our trip as memory.  
Its a unforgatable moment

Rahul Tiwari
  We travelled to Sikkim, Gangtok, Darjeeling as part of North east tour Package of Namaste india trip from 13th May 2016 to 22nd May 2016. This was our first experience with Namaste India Trip and I can gladly say that it won't be the last. Even though we couldn't visit Lachung due to unforeseen circumstances and moody weather characteristic of North East India, our tour managers made sure our days weren't wasted. Namaste India Trip showed us different places that weren't in our itinerary because we couldn't visit Lachung. Our Tour Manager Krishna did a good job. I would like to close this feedback with a Thank you Tour Managers and Namaste India trip for a wonderful and memorable tour. See you soon.  
Very Good

Shakhi
  Thank you Namaste India Trip. I am very happy with the services provided by Namaste India Trip, I have recently gone on my honeymoon to Manali , it was a very fun, exciting and memorable experience, some of the tourist spots truly left us speechless. I was so curious about exploring the place, it was so amazing. It is a very good destination for couples. We had so much fun in Manali. The hotel we stayed in provided us really good room service. The activities conducted were superb and we were not even charged for them. Our tour Manager was a great Human being, we really enjoyed travelling with him, he was very soft spoken, approachable and humble . Even Chinmay was very cooperative and helpful. Our guided the tour in the best possible way. I would definitely ask my friends and family to consider Namaste India Trip atleast once in their life. Namaste India Trip is the one of the best travel companies; you can easily rely upon them. When you travel with them, be assured your trips would be safe, comfortable and beautiful.  
Manali Tour

Sneha
  I called up Namaste India Trip representative on 2nd April 2017, regarding an inquiry about a trip I was planning. I spoke to an executive named Miss Renu and was pleased to talk to her as she was really polite and very helpful. She answered all my queries with ease and showed very good and positive eagerness to answer all my questions regarding my trip. She helped me in the best way she could. I have called many travel companies for the same but I got the best response from your company. I am very happy with the way your employees are working and handling all guests. It really gives a very good impression about Namaste India Trip.  
Very Good

Vanessa Fomby
  Had an amazing experience with Namaste India Trip (Manali - Shimla - Chandigarh) The tour managers - Mr. Krishna made us comfortable with the trip and did an awesome job being with us! They were at best doing their job without any issues coming front. Even the service was excellent , plus the accommodation was perfect. Their Friendliness with the group was the main thing which made every singles trip memorable and happy! Cheers. Vanessa Fomby 10 June 2017  
Manali - Shimla - Chandigarh

V.Subramanian
  Dear Shantiji and Manojji We would like to thank your for excellent arrangements during our recent tour to Gujrat from 21st to 28th January 2017. At the outset the car provided was in very good condition and driver Ramesh was very polite,accommodating and informative. and a safe driver. Eventhough we had taken standard hotels we would like appreciate the quality of following hotels ie Prince Residency,Bhuj, Shubh Suvidha Somnath and Classique in Rajkot. Remaining 3 hotels Ahmedabad and Dwarka were just OK. We will not hesitate to recommend your services to our friensds and relatives. Kindly send us details of your Char Dham tours with eparture etails.  
Gujarat Tour

Bhanu
  I along with my family completed the Kashmir tour and would like to thank Namaste India Trip for creating such sweet memories for us. I have been on couple of other tours (international as well domestic) with Namaste India Trip but this was the best experience I have ever had. The itinerary for this tour is superb and gives you enough desired relaxation time apart from covering all the sightseeing places. The food and the hotels were excellent especially the food and service at Grand Mumtaz, Pahalgam. The travel was well spread so as to not let it take a toll on our health. The tour like all other Namaste India Trip was very well coordinated right from the pick-up till the drop at the airport with 100% attention to the comfort of the guests. At Gulmarg my mom was not feeling well and we didn’t have the required medicine. Rohan and Hrishikesh ensured that we got the medicine for which they had to walk to a medical store almost 3 kms away in the evening. Also, our travel to Pahalgam was delayed due to traffic jams and road blocks and the lunch spot was quite far. They got us biscuits and Tea so that we don’t stay hungry. Throughout the trip both of them were extremely patient, co-operative, enthusiastic, informative and helpful. Also thanks to all our group members, they were fantastic. Once again thanks a lot to Namaste India Trip for providing us such wonderful experience. Hope to see you soon.  
Kashmir Tour

Preeti
  I am very much thankful to you (Rashmi) and Namaste India for arranging such a wonderful tour. However, regarding hotel and some welcome stuff as mentioned in the package earlier, was nowhere seen after arrival nor during departure. Except the above mentioned, rest was fine. The Sight seeing arranged with the car was also good. I specially thank to rashmi for the service and look forward for many more such tours thru Namaste India trip.Thanks Preeti.  
Manali Family Tour

Kanchan
  Great job namaste india trip! the guide was super knowlegeable, the services were top notch especially the food services and our tour manager was so nice and patient through out. i will definitely take another trip with your guys  
Excellent

C.T. Sekar
  I would like to thank one and all in namaste india trip organisers for having rendered an excellent cooperation for the arrangement made on my Ujjain trip. The hotels arranged r high class standard. The innova driver Mr. Gopi Yadhav is a disciplined nice driver. Trip was outstanding. My thanks to Smt. Subhaji and my very very special thanks to Mr. Manoj Bhandari for his best cooperation in all aspects. I suggest this namaste india trip Organisers are very very good. Thank u for all.  
Ujjain Trip

Mr. Nageshwar
  I have been using Namaste India services for 2 years and I am very happy with them. They are excellent at what they provide, thx Nageshwar .  
Very good

Shikha Desai
  my experience with namaste india trip has been a memorable one. me and my family opted for namaste india because of its great reputation. our trip started off and ended on a happy note. our guide was very friendly and easy going, the food which was provided to us was delecious. no delays were caused and the entire tour went on smoothly.  
Family Group

Deepak
  Thank you very much for the Kashmir package that you offered us, it was a great experience for my family. I appreciate your efforts in getting us a good deal. Hoping to get in touch with Travel & more again for our future holiday plans.  
Kashmir Tour

Malika Obroy
  i wish huge success for namaste india trip and their future ventures since they have offered impeccable service. from the stay options at the hotel to the food and sightseeing, every arrangement was so good that it made my trip worthwhile and exremely memorable.  
Memorial Trip

Rakhi
  Taking a char dham journey with namaste india trip has been one of the best decisions of my life. from the moment we were picked up from our location to the end of the journey me and my family (father, mother and brother) had a memorable time.  
Very Good

Rajbeer Singh Kandari
  we are thankful of Mr. Harsh from namasteindiatrip for making our corporate tour unforgettable for us, we wish him a long growth and happiness for his work and dedication.  
We love the services of Namasteindiatrip

Shubham Pandey
  It was our first tour with Namaste India Trip and it was awesome, we all enjoyed a lot. Service provided was excellent. Shubham Pandey and Rahul Dalvi this 2 guys were awesome and made our tour unforgettable. They helped us in every possible way . We enjoyed a lot because of the efforts taken by these two guys are energetic, hardworking and caring throughout the tour. Thanks once again for making our tour awesome and memorable.  
Very Good

Rupesh Bhindi
  I would like to express my gratitude on behalf of my family members who embarked on the religious expedition curated by Namaste Trip India. Your service from inception to completion has been impeccable and have delivered a first-rate customer service where I never felt during our communication phase disappointed. The allocated driver Mr Santosh was truly a down to earth gentleman who assisted in every way possible. The Tempo vehicle was very spacious, comfortable and relatively new. My grandparents were filled with joy and happiness after an enriching experience. They all thoroughly enjoyed their time at all the places they visited and overnight stay with great hotels with exception of the hotel in Allabahd, as they did not like the hotel as it wasn’t upto the standard compared to the others. The best hotel was Golden Tulip in Lucknow followed by Zeeras in Varanasi. They have brought back great memories to cherish and are already considering another adventure with Namaste Trip India. We would highly recommend your company to other consumers.  
Its a unforgatable moment

K.Santhanam
  Dear Shanthi & Team We are back in Muscat yesterday , This is a thank you note to Namasteindiatrip who organized our pilgrimage trip in India, we (my-self and my wife ) contacted Namaste India Shanthi with our interest to visit Bathrinath and Kethernath for around 7 days, they organized a very detailed and nice tour tailored for us to see the all the places hassle free. The Itinerary was perfect and Mr. Manoj who implemented it were even better except the helicopter arrangements mess-up to kethernath . The Manager, the representatives, the driver Mr Raju were all professionals and worthy of saying thanks for a well done job. Special Note to Shanthi : Thanks for your cooperation and even odd time phones from us which was responded and We will be in touch with you for our balance do dhum tour in a couple of months.  
pilgrimage trip in India

Mr. Aggarwal
  Very Honest, Professional, Friendly,at all aspect, We would definitely use your services again and refer you to others. Thank you for everything.  
Happiest moment of my life

Murali Natarajan
  Dear Shanthi Ji and Namaste Team, Thanks for a wonderful trip though tiring and a bit unnerving! Our Driver Vikrant was a real find and hats of to his patience , tenacity and sheer hard driving he had to do enduring the elements. I do not have any problems in recommending your company to my relative and friends, Thanks once again,  
Very good

Badal Gajja
  i had booked my chardham yatra that started from delhi. the sales executive who had guided and helped us through the booking procedure and gave us excellent tour information beforehand which proved to be very helpful to us. the sightseeing exploration and even accommodation and meals were of the best quality. coach was also excellent. the driver was driving it and i feel that the word excellent is too small for him as he was driving like the king of heights. he was very cool headed and was a genuinely honest and a good person.  
very good

shyla pai
  Hi, We availed the services of Namaste India for the Delhi,Agra,Mathura trip. All your sales executives were extremely courteous and provided all the information required.Special mention about Mr.Ashish for his promptness. The driver Mr.Sanjay was very decent and soft spoken. We absolutely enjoyed our trip with out any hitches any time. We would like to avail your services in the future. Thank you.  
Very Good

Arnav
  I always knew that char dham yatra is very difficult, however you made my yatra very easy and fun also! thank you for such a memorable time. i will definitely recommend this trip to anyone planning a visit to the char dham. the services, food, transportaion and stay, everything was to the point and i have no complaints whatsoever.  
Very Good

Testimonial
  My husband and myself, along with our friends, just returned from our trip to Manali. Namaste India Trip carefully planned our whole trip. We started planning this trip last month and they changed our plane totally and made easy as it could be. My husband and myself had never been such kind of tour before and had no idea about such hill stations. We had a wonderful trip and would like to recommend plan tour with Namaste India Trip. We had wonderful company of other tour members. We all were very happy with each other and involved in different activities during tour. We were in a tempo traveler with a intelligent and cautious driver Mr. Suraj. He was helpful and experienced in hill roads. We will not forget the journey ever especially toy Train.  
Shimla, Manali Tuor

Divya
  with heat on a constant rise me and my family along with a few of my cousins decided to visit kashmir. however in the beginning we were really struggling to find an affordable tour package. then a friend of mine recommended namaste india trip, she had been on their char dham yatra and had only good things to say about them. and true to her words, our kashmir tour was so so good. from the hotel where were staying to the food, driver and transportation, every single thing was well taken care of. thanks a lot namaste india trip! you guys are the best!  
Memorial Trip

Rajat Doholiya
  my wife and I wanted to go on a fun packed vacation and Namaste india trip was exactly what I needed. Our close friend recommended this travel company to us and we consider ourselves lucky. We booked a fun as well as a romantic journey to kerala where we were made to stay in houseboats and everything was so well arranged. The food was delicious, the guide was extremely helpful and the driver was so well mannered. Me and my wife had a great time.  
Memorial Trip

Prachi
  namaste india trip is now my favorite company to avail some of the most dependable and hassle free packages. our tour guide was a happy go lucky person who gave us complete information about wherever we went. the entire journey was fun packed and i will cherish it completely.  
Very Good

Kapil
  me and my family wanted to go on a different type of holiday this summer to a unique destination. we decided to go for the Sri Lanka tour package of namaste india trip. our tour operator was extremely helpful and understanding. the hotels were remarkable and the food was equally good. every place we went to was a memorable experience thanks to you guys. we really appreciate all your services to us and all this made our holiday extremely memorable. i wish your team the best.  
Very Good

Sonakshi
  my parents (both are over 60) really wanted to have a spiritual journey. a close friend of ours recommended namaste india trip to us since they had gone for the char dham yatra with them last year itself and had only good things to say about the entire team. the entire pilgrimage was a very well coordinated team work and everything was well taken care of from the pick up point to the darshan and departure. my mother required extra care due to her arthiritis, which was also addressed and she was made comfortable. thank you so so much namaste india trip, we will definitely go on a char dham yatra trip with you. good luck to you guys!  
Memorial Trip

Prakash Patel
  I Opt To Namaste India Trip for My Honeymoon Trip to Himanchal. we really enjoy the trip & the arrangement was fantastic by the “Namaste India Trip”. we are thankful to Namaste India Trip for their efforts.  
Memorable Honeymoon Tour

V Balasubramanian
  Dear Ashish we are just back after Indore and Ujjain trip it was very nicely organised everything was fine starting with the car the driver the hotel so at Indore and Ujjain and the food served at hotels were very good thanks for your effort. Excepting the same type of arrangement during CharDham and Nepal trip.  
CharDham and Nepal trip

K R Sudhakar Rao
  My Kashmir trip was fantastic. We both thoroughly enjoyed all 6 days in Srinagar and around. Our cab driver, Firdosh was wonderful and kept us moving all the places and informed throughout the trip from starting to end. The tour plan was comprehensive, we saw all the spots and several places that were off the beaten path. Cab was fine, hotels were very good. Before starting i was suspecting about hotels but they assured me about hotel and really services of hotels were fabulous as well as houseboat. So i appreciate Namaste India Trip to plan my trip and made the journey easy, comfortable and unforgettable. Thanks to team Namaste India Trip.  
Unforgettable Kashmir Trip

Replied within 24 hours
